alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Garfield; Grant; Kay; Major; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 02 at 11:23AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Oklahoma, including the following counties, Alfalfa, Garfield, Grant, Harper, Kay, Major, Woods and Woodward. Portions of northern Texas, including the following counties, Baylor, Foard, Hardeman, Knox and Wilbarger. * WHEN...Through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered thunderstorms will be possible this afternoon, which may cause areas of flooding. Additional and more widespread heavy rain is expected this evening and overnight. Rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches will be possible, with localized amounts of 4 to 6 inches possible. - For safety information, please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Alfalfa; Garfield; Grant; Kay; Major; Woods; Woodward
